item.title: @elonmusk: NEWS: UAE launches global partnership with Starlink to deliver digital education to remote communiti...
item.description: NEWS: UAE launches global partnership with Starlink to deliver digital education to remote communities worldwide. The Digital School, part of Mohammed bin Rashid Al Maktoum Global Initiatives, aims to expand access to high quality online learning for students across the globe.

item.title: @elonmusk: When a nation forgets its history, it risks repeating its darkest mistakes. That is why Congressman ...
item.description: When a nation forgets its history, it risks repeating its darkest mistakes. That is why Congressman Wesley Hunt has introduced legislation to establish a 28th Amendment, requiring every member of Congress to pass a basic civics exam before taking the oath of office. Those entrusted with representing the American people should first demonstrate a clear understanding of the Constitution, our history, and the principles that built this nation. Knowledge of our founding ideals is not optional. It is essential. Because protecting America‚Äôs future begins with honoring its past, and safeguarding the foundations of this Republic starts with leaders who truly understand it.

item.title: @elonmusk: to recap: > be the united kingdom > 1,400 children raped in rotherham alone > government's investiga...
item.description: to recap: > be the united kingdom > 1,400 children raped in rotherham alone > government's investigations confirms it > council "suppressed discussion for fear of upsetting community relations" > girls get arrested for being drunk at the scene > their rapists walk free > 16 years of this > someone posts about it online > arrested > 12,000 people arrested last year for social media posts (more than china, russia, north korea, combined) > still can't find the grooming gangs though > prince andrew flies on epstein's plane > settles with trafficking victim for ¬£12 million > the queen helps pay > no criminal charges or media outrage > congressman confirms 6 more names redacted from epstein files > one is "high up in a foreign government" > still no outrage > virginia giuffre, the woman who exposed it all, "kills herself" > yesterday the ministry of justice orders deletion of the UK's largest court data archive arrested the girls, arrested the posters, paid off the victim, redacted the names, deleted the records one starts wondering if the system is working as designed

item.title: @elonmusk: SpaceX just officially shifted its #1 priority to building a self-growing city on the Moon. Not a ba...
item.description: SpaceX just officially shifted its #1 priority to building a self-growing city on the Moon. Not a base. Not an outpost. A city. Here's why it makes sense: you can launch to the Moon every 10 days vs. every 26 months for Mars. Two-day trip vs. six months. That means hundreds of iteration cycles before you could even attempt the same thing on Mars. And today Elon Musk followed up saying SpaceX will build a system that lets anyone travel to the Moon. The engineering logic here is sound. Build fast, learn fast, then go further.
